snippet: Somasundaram Gunasegaram turned to showing American movies to keep his Bollywood theater in Queens afloat. But he is already $100,000 behind on rent.
abstract: Somasundaram Gunasegaram turned to showing American movies to keep his Bollywood theater in Queens afloat. But he is already $100,000 behind on rent.

headline.main: Gone Hollywood, Bollywood Theater in Queens Still Struggles
